mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM acces_order_spec where ACCES_MARK_STATUS ='1' AND 1=1
AND ADD_TIME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ADD_TIME ='' OR ADD_TIME IS NULL)
AND ADD_TIME !=''
AND WAVE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (WAVE ='' OR WAVE IS NULL)
AND WAVE !=''
AND ORDER_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ORDER_NUM ='' OR ORDER_NUM IS NULL)
AND ORDER_NUM !=''

SELECT * FROM acces_order_spec WHERE ACCES_MARK_STATUS = '1' AND 1 = 1
AND SCHE_TIME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (SCHE_TIME ='' OR SCHE_TIME IS NULL)
AND SCHE_TIME !=''
AND WAVE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (WAVE ='' OR WAVE IS NULL)
AND WAVE !=''
AND ORDER_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ORDER_NUM ='' OR ORDER_NUM IS NULL)
AND ORDER_NUM !=''
ORDER BY WAVE ASC LIMIT #{pageNow},#{pageSize}
